The preds and Maxs are about to enter more or less dangerous combat here. D=
o you guys want me to GM the combat as I did before or do you want to RP it=
 on an individual basis? I don't mind doing it, although it will slow down =
my response time as I will have to resolve each round of combat. 

The reas=
on why I ask is that although the Maximals have shot down all the original =
sweeps, no one RPed getting hit by any of the blasts they were firing back.=
 It does not upset me, since they were essentially just sweeps, but I would=
 like to preserve the realism as much as possible, and that real sense of d=
anger here. 

So do you guys want to RP combat yourselves or do you want me=
 to do it?

Oh and to clarify, the rules for battle if you guys want to do =
it on your own are:

Each person states what they INTEND to do and you allo=
w the other person to indicate in thier return post if the shot hits/misses=
/bounces off armor or the like, and then it goes the other way. 

Anyways, =
which way do you want to do?

Preston
